name: Reflections - by Da Xu
description:
Do Memories Dream? 

A collaboration series between performance artist Yujie Gao and audiovisual artist Da Xu. Using documentation material of Yujie's previous work as raw material, combined with a digital simulation of Mark Bradford's real-life process, old material is re-imagined into something different. 

Both Yujie and Da presented their own interpretations of the material and the process. This piece is Da's take on Yujie's performance art piece "Reflections."
